name: WONDERFUL MU CANG CHAI – SAPA  TOUR
description: This is the amazingly beautiful land with magnificent terraced fields such as Che Cu Nha, La Pan Tan and De Xu Phinh recognized as the National Heritage by the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism. In the recent years, Mu Cang Chai has been more famous for the Vietnamese and foreigners, especially attracts a large number of people who like taking photos.
